text: Carly (pronounced as CAHR-lee) is a female given name and the feminine form for the name Carl. The name has a German and Norse connection to it. Carly is also spelled Carlea, Carlee, Carli and Carleigh. People with the name Carly or its other versions include Carly Fiorina (a politician), Carly Rae Jepsen (a singer and musician) and Carly Patterson (the American gymnast). ==References== Category:Given names
title: Carly
